sqlMap.select:
select o.orgname , count(t.deviceid) tot from t_new_deviceManagement t , om_organization o where t.orgcode = o.orgcode
t.orgcode in( select orgcode from om_organization start with orgcode = #orgcode# connect by prior orgid = parentorgid )
t.DEVICENAME = #deviceName#
t.DEVICEMODEL = #deviceModel#
t.DEVICE_STATE = #deviceState#
t.MEMORY > #memoryMin#
t.MEMORY < #memoryMax#
t.HARDDISK > #hardDiskMin#
t.HARDDISK < #hardDiskMax#
t.OSVERSION = #osVersion#
t.SOFTWAREVERSION like '%'|| #softwareVersion# ||'%'
t.IEVERSION = #ieVersion#
t.USEFUL like replace('%'|| #useful# ||'%', ',', '%')
t.PLUGIN like replace('%'|| #plugIn# ||'%', ',', '%')
t.PERIPHERAL like replace('%'|| #peripheral# ||'%', ',', '%')
and t.orgcode in( select orgcode from om_organization start with orgcode = '$orgcodeTemp$' connect by prior orgid = parentorgid )
group by o.orgname

select t.*, o.orgname from t_new_deviceManagement t , om_organization o where t.orgcode = o.orgcode
t.ORGCODE = #orgcode#
t.DEVICENAME = #deviceName#
t.IPADRESS like '%'|| #ipAdress# ||'%'
t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_2 = #otherAttribute_2#
t.DEVICE_STATE = #deviceState#
t.OTHERINFO_2 like replace('%'|| #otherInfo_2# ||'%', ',', '%')
t.REMARKS_1 like '%'|| #remarks_1# ||'%'
t.REMARKS_2 like '%'|| #remarks_2# ||'%'
t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_3 = #otherAttribute_3#
t.OSVERSION = #osVersion#
t.OTHERINFO_3 like replace('%'|| #otherInfo_3# ||'%', ',', '%')
t.DEVICEMODEL = #deviceModel#
t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_1 = #otherAttribute_1#
t.OTHERATTRIBUTE_4 = #otherAttribute_4#
t.OTHERINFO_4 like replace('%'|| #otherInfo_4# ||'%', ',', '%')
order by o.orgname, T.IPADRESS, T .deviceName, T .deviceModel asc
select a.*, b.orgname from t_new_deviceManagement a,om_organization b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.DEVICEID = #deviceId:DECIMAL#
